title: Introducing: HOAX
body:
This is one of my favourite new artists of the year.

**HOAX** arrive with little information (as per – and hey, the name itself even alludes to perhaps the entire project being something of an inside joke), and a trio of debut tracks – PEAU, DATA BASE ERROR and KUNT. Shadowy, R&B inspired numbers, they’re equal parts elegant and menacing. Check them out below.

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
